title: What happens to rank End of Season? Border 5v5s
body:
Hi guys. I got Master in S5 Rank 5v5s and got the border for it, Now I have the border this season but dont play ranked 5s anymore. (Border is for Normals&Ranked 5v5 games) ANd was wandering since I dont play anymore Rank 5s or havent recieved a rank for it this season, will I lose the border?

Thanks guys, always been a question ive been wandering. I never thought youd lose it but someone told me i can.

replies.body: glad teams are gone, so boosted animal dont play with high elo and claim a border

search you up, lol you account looks boosted, diamond and challenger team 5v5 rank  but can't climb easy low elo dynamic queue and lose 46% of your games over 400 games lol clearly you got in a team for fun and claim a border that you didnt deserved

Ranked borders display your rank from the last season. If you don't place this season, your border for next season will not exist and you'll simply show as unranked last season. 

Check out our [ranked rewards 2016 announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) for additional details. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Yes But Even for Ranked 5s? Since it was removed, or added to a weekly basis its very hard to get to that rank again with such little time...
I'm on OCE btw if that makes a difference
